tool_description:
Live Scores and Odds for Soccer, Tennis and Basketball (source bet365)
#LiveData 🚀
name: live-scores
title: live-scores

api_list.name: event
api_list.description:
Event details including scores and odds.
The visibility of odds or markets are specified with field "v" which is set to 0 for disabled and 1 for enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com/score/event/1249098"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com/score/event/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: events
api_list.description:
Sport wise events listing (we cover 3 sports for now, more sports will be added later).
Pass one of the following values in sport parameter:
Soccer
Basketball
Tennis
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com/score/events/Soccer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com/score/events/{sport}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-scores10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
